#summary description of the waterfall display

= Waterfall Display =

The waterfall display shows a history of the frequency content of the currently displayed [Tuner tuner].

== Context Menus ==

Right-click anywhere in the waterfall display to view a list of context-sensitive menu options.  See the [SpectralDisplay Spectral Display] page to see descriptions of the Color, Display and Frequency context menus.

  * *Pause* - pauses the waterfall and displays *Paused* in the upper left corner.  When you un-pause the display, the waterfall will show all frequency history that happened while paused.
